src:
The 9to5Mac BundleHunt delivers over 40 top apps from just $1 each
04 Nov 2019, 18:38 by Trevor Daugherty
Today we’re announcing the 9to5Mac BundleHunt, which delivers our readers a number of top-grade apps from just $1. You’ll receive lifetime access along with consistent upgrades on each title. But be sure to act quick, as today’s $1 starting price goes up to $2 and so on every few days throughout the month of November. Our exclusive BundleHunt delivers your choice of over 40 apps with substantial discounts along the way. Hit the jump to learn more, or you can check out the entire sale right here.
Our new 9to5Mac BundleHunt is a great way to pick up notable apps at a significant price drop along the way. There are 43 apps all together to choose from starting at $1, so be sure to browse all the way to the bottom of the page to see all of your options. Here are a few our top picks:

Sid Meier’s Civilization Beyond Earth: The newest edition of E3’s best strategy game offers the most comprehensive worlds yet. Dare to defy the world in this award-winning strategy game!
Write: A modern note-taking app with a stunning interface. It’s a beautiful way to take notes on your Mac.
Photos Revive: Automatically colorize your old black-and-white photos using a revolutionary artificial intelligence that will add colors in an ultra-realistic way.
Luminar Flex Plug-in: Enhance your shot-editing workflow with the Luminar Plugin.
MaFileRenamer: maFileRenamer empowers you to rename your files like never before.

You’ll find even more options from the 9to5Mac BundleHunt promotion on this landing page. If you just recently upgraded to Catalina, or picked up a new Mac this year, our exclusive promotion is a great way to load up on apps and boost your productivity.
FTC: We use income earning auto affiliate links. More.
